name: Rhythm Rampage
description:
See  how this game was done

This Game is a combination of Rhythm Strategy and Fighting, made for the Mix and Game Jam in 48 Hours. Play vs the AI or locally vs a friend.

How to Play:

Controll P1: w/a/s/d + space    P2: Up/Down/Lef/Right + right ctr

Hit your command on beat. 

a  -> move left

d  -> move right

w -> jump/ dodge bullet

s ->crouch/ dodge sword
